name: Maygan Harris
text: Pizza hut always makes my food next to perfect and are always so friendly. I also love the online rewards club they have I mean you can't beat being rewarded with a free pizza just for buying pizza with them.

name: Jason Cobb
text: Placed a large order and it was ready for pickup quickly and correct. Pizza was good as well.

name: Kenneth Evans
text: The food is hit or miss I was so happy to get great food the last time. The BAD I noticed on my bank statement I was overcharged so I called Pizza Hut concerning my take out order and being for overcharged. It seems that one of their â€¦More

name: Laura Simpson
text: There is NEVER NEVER NEVER enough staff. Waited 15 mins to be seated. No one was available to seat us. It's not the waitresses fault. If falls right on Poor management. Tables have not been bussed. One has been sitting here since before I arrived. I have been coming here for the past 10 years. It has never improved.

name: Kara Maya
text: I'm not the biggest fan of Pizza Hut pizza, however this place nails it. On Tuesdays there is a family night pizza buffet - the kids eat free on top of it, which makes for a very cheap dinner. 2 Adults, 2 Kids, 4 Fountain Drinks & Tip â€¦More

name: Nicole matthews
text: Past couple times I have been I have only seen one elderly woman who waits on everyone I feel bad for her rushing around but I tipped her $10. I never normally do that but she was very nice and keeper up with the lunch rush. The cucumbers â€¦More

name: The Robloxian Mobile Device
text: GREAT SERVICE!!! They were great. But when a  old elderly lady went up there and got every bit of the pizza she only left two. But besides that the service was great they wait on you and I recommend it

name: Melissa Gioia
text: Staff there is rude I ordered 6 pizzas and while on the phone with them I heard a guy in the back ground cussing and complaining about my order I will be calling corporate when they open back up they need to hire new staff will never order pizza from them again I hope they all get fired

name: William Carr
text: Good service but limited selection

name: Cameron McDaniel
text: The food is always good. The service is terrible.  The place is also in desperate need of a remodel.

name: joyce new
text: Great pizza. Good price. If they had more workers wait time would be less.

name: Mamie Gray
text: I love this place Nashville Ga and the people who work there are so nice and want to help in any way,I could eat there every day I love Pizza Hut.

name: Drady Crady
text: It has good food and good service

name: Cheryl Bonham
text: I wouldnt have given them 1 star if I could have given a negative that would be closer. My recommendation is NEVER order boneless wings, mine were raw in the center.  When I called them they said oh sorry.  Think I will just dispute credit card charge and say oh sorry.

name: Lizzie Merritt
text: Called Pizza hut for curbside pickup...the guy was very rude...the other phone rang and he said Lord help us...he pretty much talked us of ordering ..so we was very upset and hung upðŸ˜

text: We go in for the buffet at lunch.  Most of the time the bar has a good selection of pizza, but the star of the show is the dressings on the salad bar.  The service is outstanding.

name: T Mckin
text: Good customer service!! Good and fresh food!!!

text: Store Closes at 10. That's fine.  Place an order to be delivered here in town.  Pizza hut calls to say they cant fill/deliver my order because they let the delivery driver go home at 9:30. This place is a joke!

text: Heating system was out.  We had to ask, when everyone in our party commented that they were cold.  Service was fine,  our  waitress was 17 and she did fine.  Pizza was good,  but some things on salad bar were questionable.  The tomatoes â€¦More
